entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 26. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 24 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 20.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 27 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 27 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 25 December 2022
